name: Digital Divine
description:
(No Longer In Development Since April 2020)

__________________________________________

Digital Divine is a simple prototype I solo developed in early 2020 for a Diploma of Digital and Interactive Games course, focusing on lighting, color and tone, drawing references from various abstract science fiction media including Blade Runner and tron.

For the work I did on this project I was granted a High Distinction.

This was my first ever prototype developed.
